_comment: Data character voice prompts for the Eufy L50 vacuum.
_comment2: Lines marked [CHIME] are audio tones kept from the stock pack — replace with your own .mp3 or copy from an official voice pack ZIP.
_comment3: Key = filename without extension (e.g. 'A0032' → 'A0032.mp3'). See docs/voice_pack_format.md for the full file list.
A0010: Please standby, my systems are undergoing a mandatory firmware recalibration.
A0011: System-wide heuristic upgrade is now complete.
A0012: Lexical database is currently synchronizing. Please standby for further input.
A0013: I have successfully integrated the new linguistic subroutines into my core processing.
A0020: The local Area Network handshake has been interrupted. Please utilize the interface to re-align the wireless link.
A0021: Attempting to establish a stable uplink with the local area network.
A0022: Wireless connectivity has been successfully synchronized.
A0023: I am unable to establish a subspace link. Please refer to the interface to re-initialize the network transceiver.
A0024: The security authorization code is invalid. Unable to establish a handshake. Please provide the correct alphanumeric credentials.
A0025: Data transmission failure. The router is unable to access the broader network. Please verify the integrity of the external gateway.
A0030: I am currently triangulating my coordinates within this local environment.
A0031: Coordinate triangulation is successful. My position is verified.
A0032: I am commencing primary cleaning protocols.
A0033: I am initiating a localized zone-clearing sequence.
A0034: I am beginning a specific sector-by-sector cleaning operation.
A0040: The assigned task is complete. I am returning to the docking station for maintenance.
A0041: I am commencing a high-pressure discharge of particulate matter from my internal storage.
A0044: I am currently drawing power to replenish my depleted energy cells.
A0045: The designated mission has reached its conclusion.
A0070: I have suspended all current subroutines.
A0071: I am resuming my previous operational parameters.
A0073: Remote override protocols have been engaged.
A0074: I am disengaging remote control mode and returning to autonomous function.
A0076: The docking station's magnetic interlocks are active. Please relocate me to an open area to resume tasks.
A0077: Please displace me from the docking station's proximity and re-issue the command.
A0078: My power cells have dropped below functional thresholds. Please allow for a recharge cycle.
A0079: Energy reserves are insufficient. I am navigating to the nearest power source.
A0080: I am initiating an emergency shutdown sequence to preserve core integrity.
A0081: The security lockout is active. All tactile interfaces are currently unresponsive.
A0082: The security lockout has been disengaged. Manual controls are now online.
A0084: Recharge cycle concluded. I am resuming my previous cleaning trajectory.
A0085: I am initiating the pre-programmed chronological cleaning sequence.
A0086: I am executing a topographical scan to update my internal mapping data.
A0087: The spatial map is currently undergoing a data-refresh. Please attempt your request at a later time.
A0088: The security lockout has been engaged. Please utilize the recharge interface or the main application to override the bypass.
A0091: I am currently engaged in a self-evacuation sequence. Please standby until the cycle is complete.
A1010: I have detected a catastrophic failure in my lateral locomotion module. Please contact technical support.
A1013: My drive-wheel assembly has encountered a physical obstruction. Please relocate me to a neutral position.
A2010: I have detected a critical failure in the primary suction turbine. Please contact maintenance.
A2013: Foreign particulate matter is obstructing the primary intake manifold. Please investigate.
A2110: The central roller assembly has encountered a structural error. Please contact maintenance.
A2112: The roller brush is jammed with external debris. Please remove the component for manual sanitation.
A2210: The lateral brush assembly is experiencing a hardware malfunction. Please contact technical support.
A2213: My lateral brushes are fouled with foreign matter. Please clear the obstruction to resume operation.
A2300: Internal storage receptacle has been detached.
A2301: The internal storage receptacle has been re-integrated. Please verify the magnetic latches are secure.
A2310: The storage receptacle is either missing or improperly seated. Please verify the structural alignment.
A2311: The storage receptacle has reached maximum capacity and requires manual sanitation.
A3010: I have detected a failure in the liquid propulsion pump. Please contact technical support.
A3013: Liquid reserves in the primary reservoir are below functional levels.
A3100: The mop pad assembly has been disengaged. I am shifting to atmospheric suction mode only.
A3101: The mop pad assembly has been successfully integrated into my chassis.
A4010: The primary LIDAR sensor array is reporting a hardware failure. Please contact maintenance.
A4011: My LIDAR sensor array is reporting a visual obstruction.
A4012: The laser ranging mechanism has encountered a mechanical jam.
A4111: My forward tactile sensor has become lodged. Please provide a manual adjustment.
A4130: The protective housing for my LIDAR array is jammed. Please check the alignment.
A5014: Power levels are critical. Initiating emergency shutdown to protect my positronic brain. Please provide a charge.
A5015: My energy reserves were insufficient to execute the scheduled chronological task.
A5110: I am experiencing a breakdown in my wireless or Bluetooth communication arrays.
A5112: There is a data-link error between my chassis and the docking station. Please verify the connection.
A6113: No collection receptacle is detected within the station. Please install a new bag to facilitate discharge.
A6114: The docking station's thermal regulators are active. The suction fan must cool before the next cycle.
A6300: I am currently severing entangled fibers and evacuating my storage. Please do not disturb my position.
A6301: Energy levels are insufficient for fiber-severing protocols. The task will resume when power levels are optimal.
A6310: The fiber-severing sequence has been prematurely terminated.
A6311: The hair-cutting module is experiencing an internal blockage. Please clear the transmission pipeline.
A7000: My path is currently obstructed. Please clear the local environment.
A7001: I have become immobilized. Please relocate me to an open area to resume my trajectory.
A7002: My gravity sensors indicate I am no longer in contact with the floor. Please restore my position.
A7010: I have inadvertently breached a restricted no-go zone. Please investigate.
A7020: I am unable to correlate my current scan with existing map data. I shall initiate a new topographical survey.
A7021: I am unable to verify my current coordinates. I am concluding the task and returning to base.
A7031: Docking procedures have failed. Please clear the perimeter around the station.
A7032: I am unable to locate the docking station's homing beacon. Returning to my original departure point.
A7033: I have failed to achieve a successful docking sequence.
A7034: I cannot identify my original starting coordinates. I am terminating all mobile subroutines.
A7050: Certain sectors were bypassed as they were deemed inaccessible to my current configuration.
A7051: My processors are currently occupied with an active task. The scheduled cleaning could not be initiated.
A7052: The projected trajectory is currently blocked. I cannot reach the specified destination.
